ValidationRule.description: To check only user having title = Branch Manager, Assistant Branch Manager, Personal Financial Consultant can Change Field
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: If( ISCHANGED(RTL_OnSite_Service__c), If(OR(CONTAINS($User.Title, 'Branch Manager'), $User.UserProfileName__c = 'Retail Integration API Only',$User.UserProfileName__c = 'System Administrator'), false, true ), false )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Only Branch manager or assistant branch manager can update this field (ไม่อนุญาตให้แก้ไขข้อมูลหากไม่ใช่ผู้จัดการสาขา หรือผู้ช่วยผู้จัดการสาขา)
